SEARCH

Package org.team21.game.controllers

package org.team21.game.controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ExecuteOrderController
    TheExecute order controller will execute orders based on {IssueOrderController}
    ExecuteOrderControllerTest
    JUnit test class for ExecuteOrderController.
    IssueOrderController
    The Issue order controller will execute orders and passes to {ExecuteOrderController}
    IssueOrderControllerTest
    This class contains unit tests for the IssueOrderController class.
    MapEditorController
    This class is used to create map through different commands for different operations.
    MapEditorControllerTest
    The type Map editor controller test.
    MapLoaderController
    This is the main logic of the Map Loading here in this Map Loader class to load our maps and store in memory to play or edit.
    MapLoaderControllerTest
    This test class checks if the number and name of the loaded canada map is right or not
    ReinforcementController
    The Reinforcement order controller will give armies/reinforcements linked with {IssueOrderController}
    ReinforcementControllerTest
    The type Reinforcement controller test.
    SaveMapController
    This Map Saves the Current Editted/Uneditted Game Map Object to a given file name under map folder
    ShowMapController
    This is the Controller to show the full Map in the terminal
    StartGameController
    The StartGameController will perform main load game actions and associated controllers are {ExecuteOrderController,IssueOrderController,ReinforcementController,MapLoaderController,ShowMapController}
    StartGameControllerTest
    The type Start game controller test.
